modName: Skyrim Tropical Style Suit for UNPB
summary: There are new suits in this mod.You can use this mod to replacing original clothes or use for standalone.~Have fun
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][u][b][color=#ffff00][center][u][b][color=#ffff00][size=5][u][b][color=#ffff00][size=5][u][b][color=#ffff00][size=5][u][b][color=#ffff00][size=5][u][b][color=#ffff00][size=5][u][b][color=#ffff00][size=5][u][b][color=#ffff00][size=5][u][b][color=#ffff00][u][b][color=#ffff00][img width=331,height=371]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/6099012-1470111252.png[/img][/color][/b][/u][/color][/b][/u][/size][/color][/b][/u][/size][/color][/b][/u][/size][/color][/b][/u][/size][/color][/b][/u][/size][/color][/b][/u][/size][/color][/b][/u][/size]
[/color][/b][/u][size=5][u][b][color=#ffff00][img width=876,height=85]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/6099012-1470112565.png[/img][/color][/b][/u][/size][/center][/color][/b][/u][/size][center][/center][size=6][color=#00B0F0][font=Impact][center]For UNPB[/center][/font][/color][/size][center]There are new suits in this mod.You can use this mod to replacing original clothes or use for standalone.
Clothes become very sexy and refreshing.
This mod supports[size=5] UNPB(Unified UNP HDT)[/size]
This mod can support HDT Physics(EX:HDT Physics Extensions. HDT Havok
Object......etc).
Just use NMM or MO to install the mod.
Have fun~~~[/center]
[color=#4BACC6][size=5][font=Book Antiqua][b][color=#FFFF00][center]Hot File!![/center][/color][/b][/font][/size][/color][center]Thank you for everyone's endorsement!!!!!CBBE version hot file~~:)(2016/08/05 PM12:45)[/center]
[center][img width=637,height=420]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/6099012-1470372010.jpg[/img][/center][size=5][b][color=#4BACC6][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][center]Installation Instructions[/center][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][center]This mod is only for female character.Just use NMM or MO to install this mod to play.[/center][size=5][b][color=#4BACC6][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][center]Video[/center][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][center][youtube]fOFAC7krdPk[/youtube][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ffffff]Thank you[/color] [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/MrTornFlesh]Kshahdoo[/url] [color=#ffffff]do this video for introducing CBBE version mod.[/color][/size][/font]
[size=5][b][color=#4BACC6][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ffffff]Thanks again.~~[/color][/size][/font][size=5][size=2][/size][/size][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][/center][size=5][b][color=#4BACC6][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][center][size=5][size=2][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffffff]Showcase of all available "armor". Sexy and skimpy :)[/color][/font][/size][/size][/center][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size]
[center][youtube]1jN3xwIqaFI[/youtube][/center][center]
[size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]Thank you [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/VatiWah]VatiWah[/url] do this video for introducing this mod.
Thanks again.~~[/font][/size][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][center]Skyrim Mod Review Boobs and Lubes Episode 115 has Kat looking for a new player
house, she found temporary shelter in KurooNeko Photo Studio. She
has all her followers wearing the bikini mod, skyrim tropical style
suit. Everyone should have a bikini mod for skyrim![/center][/font][size=5][b][color=#4BACC6][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][center]Contents Instruction[/center][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][center]The remodeled version mod replaces original clothes in the game.
The replaced clothes items:[/center]
[u][size=4][b][color=#00ffff]Skyrim[/color][/b][/size][/u]
Archmage
Barkeeper
Beggarclothes
Blacksmith
Chef
Emperor
Executioner
farmclothes01
farmclothes02
farmclothes03
farmclothes04
fineclothes01
fineclothes03
jester
mageapprentice
magejourneyman
merchantclothes
minerclothes
monk
mournersclothes
necromancer
prisoner
psiijic
redguard
robedarkbrotherhood
robemythicdawn
sheogorath
thalmor
warlock
weddingdress
wench
wounds
yarl
yarlclothes02
yarlclothes03

[size=3][b][color=#00ffff][u]D[/u][/color][color=#00ffff][u]L[/u][u]C-dawnguard[/u][/color][/b][/size][color=#00ffff]
[/color]vampire
vampclothes
prisoner

[u][color=#00ffff][size=3][b]DLC-dragonborn[/b][/size][/color][/u]
cultist
darkelf
miraakrobes
skaal
telvanni
templeoutfit

[center][color=#ff00ff][size=5]This mod can use [[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=5]BodySlide and Outfit Studio[/size][/color][color=#ff00ff][size=5]] to set [/size][/color][size=5][color=#ff00ff]BodySlide.[/color]
[color=#ff00ff]Just release [[/color][/size][color=#ffff00][size=5]STSS BodySlide tool for UNPB[/size][/color][size=5][color=#ff00ff]] zip file and replace the same folder in BodySlide and Outfit Studio mod.
Remember reopen BodySlide and Outfit Studio after replacing the folders.[/color][/size][/center][size=5][color=#ff00ff]
[/color][/size][center][size=5][color=#ff00ff]
[/color][/size][size=6][color=#ffff00]If you use this mod well.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Please give a endorsement.Thank you~~:)[/color][/size][/center][size=6]
[color=#f9cb9c][color=#6d9eeb][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77518/?]SKyrim Tropical Style Suit for CBBE[/url][/color]--CBBE version is there
Welcome to download.:)
[/color][/size]
[size=5][b][color=#4BACC6][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][center]About update[/center][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][center][/center][center]Clothes in this mod will be added or fixed at not the same time.
I will try my best to do this mod.
Hope you to look forward to this mod.[/center][b][size=5][b][color=#4BACC6][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][center]Necessity[/center][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][/b][center][/center][center]This mod will need these esm files:
3DLC(Dawnguard+HearthFires+Dragonborn)
SKSE
SSME[/center][center][/center][size=5][b][color=#4BACC6][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][center][color=#ea9999]Preventing from CTD[/color][/center][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][center]I suggest that player to install these mod:
Realistic Force
XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended
HDT Havok Object v1.2[/center][center][/center][size=5][b][color=#4BACC6][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][center]Notes[/center][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][center]English is not my native language.So you may be hard to read my sentences.
I feel sorry.
Thank you for reading the contents and use this mod~[/center]
author: LouisWolf
